page.title: 12POPULATION
page.content:
The population of Sherfield English and East Wellow has risen considerably in the last few years as the following table shows:
Dates Sherfield Wellow 1951 1016 1618 1961 1194 1758 1971 1264 1977 1981 1311 3227
These figures include a proportion of people who live beyond this area, but these figures still show a significant rise in population for our district. The increase is due on the one hand to the rapid growth of housing for the wealthy middle class and also the conversion of cottages for those who commute to work in the surrounding towns. There is also a notable proportion of elderly retired people.
